price: Sabõda haka, ka tsayar da fuskarka ga addini madaidaici a gabãnin wani yini ya zo, bãbu makawa gare Shi daga Allah, a rãnar nan mutãne sunã tsãgẽwa (su rabu biyu).
arabic: فَأَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ ٱلۡقَيِّمِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ يَوۡمٞ لَّا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۖ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصَّدَّعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-aqim wajhaka lilddīni al-qayimi min qabli an yatiya yawmun lā maradda lahu mina al-lahi yawma-idhin yaṣṣaddaʿūna
